CommandTranslatorRule:
This rule catches calls to the "Circle Fitter" plugin, in the Edit > Selection menu, that fits a circle ROI to the current image.
# Fit Circle ROI to current image import fiji # Get current image image = WindowManager.getCurrentImage() # Instantiate plugin circle_fitter = fiji.util.Circle_Fitter() # Set it to operate on current ImageProcessor ip = image.getProcessor() circle_fitter.setImageProcessor(ip) # Use auto-threshold - to set it manually, un-comment next line # circle_fitter.setThreshold(150) circle_fitter.setAutoThreshold() # Calculate ROI roi = circle_fitter.calculateRoi() image.setRoi(roi)
